Keywords: Scientist , X-Men
Real Name: Dr. Moira MacTaggart
Special Powers
RALLY (5): Opposing Attack Rolls. POWER: Remove a RALLY die from Dr. Moira MacTaggart to heal an adjacent character 2 clicks. (RALLY: Once per roll for each die in a finalized attack roll and for all characters with a matching RALLY die and trait color printed under their trait star, after resolutions you may choose a friendly character to gain a matching RALLY die. RALLY trait colors specify which attack type they can gain RALLY dies from. BLUE = Friendly Attack Rolls. RED = Opposing Attack Rolls. GREEN = All Attack Rolls. When a character gains a RALLY die, place a die with the matching result on their card.)
MUIR ISLAND RESEARCH LAB: POWER: Give an adjacent friendly character with the X-Men keyword a RALLY die.

Incorrect. Figures are always friendly to themselves. Figures are never adjacent to themselves.

December 20, 2021
tyroclix
WIN/LOSS: 4-1 Dr. Moira MacTaggert; physician, scientist - searching for a way to help her comrades. She is a great date for Prime Mimic, if you have him. First turn giving a Rally Die is worth 20 points. Being able to heal someone for a known amount if a huge boon in a game where your opponent has more say on what click you will be on than yourself.

she's def a good support piece, now im not too up to date on the current rules as i dont play them in casual with my group, BUT since she is adjacent and friendly to herself cant she just give herself the Rally die and heal an adjacent friendly for 2 clicks?
August 27, 2021
tidge
I like this take on Moira very much, but pretty much only if the force has a friendly X-Men keyword piece that can capitalize from a near-instant RALLY die. This alone makes her a 5-star figure. On other forces, she simply isn't bringing anything reliable to the table, except possible healing via the X-Men Team Ability.
August 25, 2021
Mut1eLov3r
I’m glad she is unique. In prerelease i pulled her, SR Mystique, Wolvie, Colossus and Marvel Girl. The remaining points could go to either Tempo or Broo (I went with Broo for the Outwit), but that team pretty much built itself. I rally’ed Marvel Girl the most for the tk but all of the others got it at least once. It’s been a while since I 3-0’ed a sealed :)
August 13, 2021
Maxphyte
She did awesome for me at my pre-release. Was handing out Rally dice like candy. Worked especially well with Marvel Girl to set up slingshot attacks. I had Marvel Girl to potentially set up the TK and Deathbird as the attacker while getting her speed boosted from Tempo. It’s too damn bad Deathbird couldn’t hit 17 defenses most of the tournament lol.
August 11, 2021
Goop
Her rally power is ok, power action to heal for 2 isn't bad. Honestly though her real value is the damage power to just GIVE an adjacent xmen a rally die. Spend the first couple turns just rallying up your team. Combos really well with Beast, totally worth 20pts.
